summary: Login fails for subset of users
description: Users in EU report 401 after deployment
root_cause: Auth service misconfigured after config change; missing audience claim validation caused token rejection
resolution: Rollback config and redeploy; validated tokens in staging
preventive_action: Add config validation in CI and monitor 401 rates with alert

root_cause: Scaling policy not applied to worker group; CPU threshold too high and no backlog metric used
resolution: Adjusted autoscaling policy and deployed new worker group
preventive_action: Add backlog-based scaling and load test before releases
